sentences.en: All large ships now have a wireless installation.
sentences.cn: 所有的大型船舶现在都有无线电装置.

sentences.en: Can you get Radio Beijing on your wireless?
sentences.cn: 你的无线电能收到北京广播 吗 ?

sentences.en: He sent the wireless set there to be mended.
sentences.cn: 他把无线电送那儿去修理.

sentences.en: I heard it on the wireless.
sentences.cn: 我是从无线电收音机里听到的。

sentences.en: I turned on my small wireless set shortly after the nine o'clock news had started.
sentences.cn: 我在九点钟的新闻节目开始后不久,就拧开我的无线电小收音机.

sentences.en: I've already got the other two on a wireless relay.
sentences.cn: 我已经得到另两个无线电信号了.

sentences.en: The devices in our brain are some sort of wireless computer network?
sentences.cn: 在我们脑子里的装置仿佛是一种无线计算机网络?

sentences.en: The wireless calls were soon responded to.
sentences.cn: 对无线电的呼叫不久有了回答.

sentences.en: There are a lot of wireless links in a radio.
sentences.cn: 收音机里有许多无线电线路.

sentences.en: They confirmed by wireless that she was picking up survivors.
sentences.cn: 他们通过无线电证实她在营救幸存者。

sentences.en: They have installed wireless apparatus on board.
sentences.cn: 他们已在船上安装了无线电设备.

sentences.en: Wireless messages tell us that the ship was sinking.
sentences.cn: 无线电报告知我们那艘船正在下沉.

sentences.en: Yes, he said about hearing your wireless booming away and coming up to complain.
sentences.cn: 对了, 他说他听到你的收音机老是响着,就走上楼来提意见.

sentences.en: You should disconnect the wireless set before you make adjustments inside it.
sentences.cn: 你应先拔掉无线电插头,再做内部调整.

words.tran_cn: 接有电线的；以铁丝围起的；极其兴奋的
金属线制的；金属丝般的；坚硬的；瘦长结实的；（噪音）尖细的
打电报者；用金属线缠结的工人；以铁丝网捕猎鸟兽者
[电] 接线，架线；线路；金属线缝术
以金属丝装；打电报给（wire的过去分词）
[通信][电讯]打无线电报；打无线电话

phrases.tran_cn: 无线互联网；无线上网；无线网际网路
无线电线路；无线电联系

trans.tran_en: Wireless technology uses radio waves rather than electricity and therefore does not require any wires

trans.tran_cn: 打无线电报；打无线电话
用无线电报与…联系；用无线电报发送
